Source_Desc: The software that powers Flashpoint is free and open-source, obviously excluding most of the supported browser plugins/technologies (we can't do much about that). Applications and utilities developed by project contributors can be found at our {GitHub team page} and at our {GitLab}.
Source_Developed_Projects_Desc: The following projects are released under the MIT license:
Source_Flashpoint_Launcher_Desc: {Flashpoint Launcher}, un lanceur extensible basé sur Electron, inspiré de LaunchBox.
Source_Flashpoint_Proxy_Desc: {Flashpoint Proxy}, une bibliothèque qui permet la communication entre un navigateur/projecteur et l'internet simulé de Flashpoint.
Source_Flashpoint_Secure_Player_Desc: {Flashpoint Secure Player}, une application avancée qui permet de lire des contenus basés sur des plugins sans apporter de modifications permanentes au registre de Windows.
Source_Flashpoint_VM_Desc: {flashpointvm}, an Apache-configured Linux disk image that securely serves the contents of ZIP archives.
Source_Flashpoint_OldCPUSimulator_Desc: {OldCPUSimulator}, un outil qui exécute des applications avec des vitesses d'horloge simulées.
Source_Utilized_Projects_Desc: The following projects are included directly within the Flashpoint download:
Source_Apache_Desc: {Apache HTTP Server}, un serveur web publié sous la licence Apache-2.0.
Source_Basilisk_Desc: {Basilisk}, un navigateur web publié sous la licence MPL-2.0. Flashpoint utilise une version 32 bits personnalisée avec sa propre marque, qui peut être trouvée {ici}.
Source_Chromium_Desc: {Chromium}, un navigateur web publié sous diverses licences open-source.
Source_PHP_Desc: {PHP}, un langage de script web publié sous la licence PHP.
Source_QEMU_Desc: {QEMU}, a machine emulator released under the GPL-2.0-only license.
